articles.title: IPL to get extended 10-week window in next ICC calendar, says BCCI secretary Jay Shah - Zee News
articles.description: The Indian Premier League (IPL) will have an extended 10-week window in the next international calendar to allow all the world’s top cricketers to participate in the popular Twenty20 competition, a top Indian board official told news agency Reuters.

articles.title: Jayden Seales, Obed McCoy, Odean Smith handed WI central contract | Cricbuzz.com - Cricbuzz - Cricbuzz
articles.description: Cricket West Indies has changed the Men's retainer contract structure to offer player contracts across all formats of cricket, compared to specific red or white-ball contracts in previous years.
